definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Brooklyn, borough of New York City
Holbrook (name)/Richard C.A. Holbrooke (1941-2010), US diplomat, influential in brokering 1995 Dayton Bosnian peace deal, US special envoy to Afghanistan and Pakistan from 2009

pinyin: Bu4 lu3 ke4 lin2 Da4 qiao2
Bu4 lu3 ke4 hai3 wen2 Guo2 jia1 Shi2 yan4 shi4
containing_words.word: 布鲁克海文国家实验室

pinyin: Bu4 lu3 ke4 hai3 wen2 Shi2 yan4 shi4

sentences.english: A ski jump in Innsbruck, Austria.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚因斯布鲁克的一个滑雪跳台。

sentences.english: Ms Mastenbroek said that behind your elbows and knees are also great points for perfume.
sentences.chinese: 马斯滕布鲁克女士表示，手肘和膝盖也是不错的位置。

sentences.english: A spokeswoman for Brookfield declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁克菲尔德公司的发言人拒绝置评。

sentences.english: I went to elementary school and high school in Brooklyn.
sentences.chinese: 我在布鲁克林念得初中和高中。

sentences.english: So are you planning to spend the summer sweating it out in Brooklyn?
sentences.chinese: 那你的暑假就准备在布鲁克林苦熬喽？

sentences.english: You see, Jane, you cannot try your tricks on Mr Brocklehurst.
sentences.chinese: 你不能在布鲁克赫斯特先生那儿耍花招。

sentences.english: The B17 is the most popular saddle in the Brooks Classic range.
sentences.chinese: B17是在布鲁克斯范围最流行的经典车座。

sentences.english: Both Cindy and Brook live in opulent circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 辛迪和布鲁克都成长在富裕的环境。

sentences.english: The Brooklyn Bridge is one of the oldest suspension bridges in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁克林大桥时美国最古老的吊桥之一。

sentences.english: Then, how would you describe people in Brooklyn?
sentences.chinese: 那你会怎么描述布鲁克林人呢？

sentences.english: The bridge from Brooklyn to Staten Island is the longest in the world.
sentences.chinese: 从布鲁克林斯台登岛经过的大桥是世界上最长的桥。

sentences.english: Our students can take courses at the Université de Sherbrooke.
sentences.chinese: 我们的学生也可以在希尔布鲁克大学上课。

sentences.english: It's time for Brooke to stop shilly-shallying.
sentences.chinese: 这时候布鲁克不能再犹豫不决了。

sentences.english: He is currently visiting professor of planning at Oxford Brookes University.
sentences.chinese: 他现任牛津布鲁克斯大学的城市规划客座教授。

sentences.english: they have to be very specific because Brooklyn is enormous.
sentences.chinese: 他们要说得很具体才行，因为布鲁克林很大。

sentences.english: Sarah stayed two weeks at Sunnybrook Farm.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉在桑尼布鲁克农场待了两个星期。

definition: Loki, god of fire and mischievous destroyer in Norse mythology
Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
